issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description:
The FS state dump can currently not be turned on or off independently of the FS debug logging.
The logic for dumping the state uses a mixture of {{FairScheduler}} and {{FairScheduler.ststedump}} to check wether it dumps. It should be just using the state dump.
fields.summary: Allow FS scheduler state dump to be turned on/off separately from FS debug log

comments.body: Trigger state dump just using the STATE_DUMP_LOG and not use LOG.
